title: Strategies for Managing High Levels of Debt
description: This chapter explores various approaches to managing overwhelming debt, including debt management plans, debt consolidation, debt settlement, and bankruptcy. Students learn to evaluate different strategies, understand their long-term impacts, and develop skills for rebuilding credit after financial setbacks.
learning_objectives: Identify various strategies for managing high levels of debt
Understand the advantages and disadvantages of debt management options
Recognize the long-term effects of bankruptcy on personal finances and credit
Explore alternatives to bankruptcy and understand when it may be necessary
Discuss ways to rebuild credit after financial setbacks

skill_builder.title: Debt Reduction Planner
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool that helps students create personalized debt management plans for various scenarios, evaluate bankruptcy options, and develop credit rebuilding strategies.

author: PFL Academy Curriculum Team
